Trade/Device Name(s): EGENS Urine Test Cup Morphine - Methamphetamine
EGENS Urine Test DipCard Morphine - Methamphetamine
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for EGENS Urine Test Cup and DipCard Morphine - Methamphetamine rapid immunochromatographic urine test for drugs of abuse
Indications for Use Summary: Rapid qualitative detection of Morphine and Methamphetamine in human urine at cutoffs of 300 ng/mL and 1000 ng/mL, respectively; for over-the-counter and prescription in vitro diagnostic use, providing preliminary test results requiring confirmation.
